Details.Value: This is the Official Portal of the Public Works Department Government of Goa, designed, developed by M/s. DEMERG Systems India and hosted at State Data Centre of  the Department of Information Technology Government of Goa.

The objective behind the Portal is to provide a single window access to the information and services being provided by Public Works Department , Government  of Goa for citizens and other stakeholders. An attempt has been made through this Portal to provide comprehensive, accurate, reliable and one stop source of information about Public Works Department , Government  of Goa and its various facets.

The content of this Portal is managed  by the Public Works Department , Government  of Goa. It is our goal to continue the enhancement and enrichment of this Portal in terms of content coverage, design and technology on a regular basis.
Public Works Department, Govt. of Goa Head Office, Altinho Panaji Goa 403001
